header.para: -vo1Allow Init() and Axit() as aliases for Constructor and Destructor

body.para: The -vo1 compiler option directs the compiler to treat Init() methods as constructors and Axit methods as Destructor.
+ | - Specifying +, or just -vo2, directs the compiler to initialize all variables and fields of type STRING and all elements of DIM ... AS STRING arrays to an empty string (String.Empty).
To set this compiler option in the Visual Studio development environment:

list.li: In the Visual Objects Compatibility section, modify the "Allow Init() and Axit() for Constructor/Destructor" property.
